metadata.synopsis: Characters hear the sound in the back of Water Queen's House and wondering what's happened. (There's also blood on the temple's entrance... so maybe they could mention that or tie together)

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Hear that? Chanting at the back of the temple - and blood stains all over.
0.context: NodeContext: Gale: 'Umberlee' is the name of the goddess worshipped here. He's familar, as she's got a lot of presence in Waterdeep
